page.title: 20 CHURCH ATTENDANCE
page.content: Out of 79 children between the ages of 7 and 12 in our school,33 attend a {Sunday School}or{Church,}a majority, in the mornings only.Just over a quarter of the town's population are church_going.An average of 48% of these are{elderly}people,24% are{ {middle_aged},9% are{young people}and 20% are{children}.Most churches have 2 to 3 services on Sundays,and 2 to 6 meetings during the week.Over \ the { {clergy}are responsible for more than 1 church.The church with recent changes is Central Methodist where,apart from the removal of the spire,a wall was removed to give a fine view on entry. Some Church leaders would like their church nearer the people on the{ {housing estates}.The research for 02320084 D Block has been done by the 10 and 11 year old children in Class 1 and their teacher Mrs M.Moffat.
